description: Corel16k003 is a dataset from the multimedia domain. The samples represent Corel images. Each image is segmented using the Normalized Cuts method. Each image is represented with the 8 largest segments. The segments are then clustered into regions and described with 40 features each. The features represent visual properties such as size, position, color, texture and shape. The features represent whether the region is present or not in a particular image. The labels are word description of the region.
name: Corel16k003
